Jargon Term: repair of right distal radius fracture and left hand fracture
Take the prescribed medications as directed
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: Do not forcefully spit for several days.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Other

Jargon Term: Do not smoke for several days
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Other

Jargon Term: Do not use straws for several days
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Other

Jargon Term: Do not forcefully blow your nose for at least 2 weeks
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Other

Jargon Term: Eat only soft foods for several days, always trying to chew on the opposite side of your mouth
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Diet

Jargon Term: Do not rinse vigorously for several days. GENTLE salt water swishes may be used
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Other
